boardgame.name: Cutthroat Caverns
Sang Rancune
割喉探險隊
boardgame.description: _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Without teamwork, you will never survive. Without betrayal, you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;ll never win._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Cutthroat Caverns is played over 9 rounds, each with a random encounter. Essentially a game of 'kill stealing'. Each round, any monster encountered will have a prestige value of 1 through 6. The player that successfully jockeys for position and lands the killing blow gets the prestige value for the encounter. Some encounters will not have a specific monster, such as a trap room for the heroes to pass through (and in this case, earning no prestige). The surviving player with the most prestige after the 9 encounters is the winner. If the players do not survive all 9 encounters, no one wins the game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;A unique combination of cooperative game play and opportunistic backstabbing._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Smirk _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Dagger Games (S_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;D 0040) Genre-bending. Dice-less. The totally immersive feel of a RPG in a simple, elegant card game. A perfect balance of cooperative gameplay and back-stabbing goodness. An artifact of untold power lies in your hands. To claim it, you must escape the caverns alive. No less than nine horrific beasts stand in your way - that, and the greed of the other players. In this game of kill-stealing, you decide whether to swing for a whopping 50 points of damage - or hold back, awaiting a more opportune time to strike. Only the final blow matters if you are to score the kill. Hold back or sabotage other’s plans too much - and the entire party will die, without a winner. Okay, that_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s what it says on the box... what_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s it really like? Cutthroat Caverns is truly unique. While most definitely a highly interactive card game and very easy to play, it requires the strategic thinking of a board game. And, for some uncanny reason, the game will make you FEEL like you are in the middle of a classic dungeon crawl, even though table talk is about as much roleplaying as you are likely to do. That all said, it has proven to have a very broad appeal with gamers across several genres. The real joy is the delicate balance between helping the party (and staying alive) vs working towards your own selfish goals (and risking the welfare of everyone). There are no dice. Each Turn, you will choose how much damage you are willing to do to the monster- or won_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t do - as you jockey for position to land the killing blow. And when characters can make that kind of decision, things get very funny _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; very deadly - very quickly. With 25 encounters, all requiring a different group strategy and seperate individual strategy, game play is always challenging. Only 9 random encounters are used in any game, so the experience is always different. With fresh new mechanics built into each expansion and a creature pool now 75 strong - there is always a new adventure ahead. And they become deadlier as we go. CUTTHROAT CAVERNS Game Design: Curt Covert, Additional Development: Justin Brunetto _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Curt Covert, Cover Design: Justin Brunetto Players: 3-6 Ages: 12 and Up Playing Time: 1 hr. 30 Min.

SHIPPING: We are near the US/Canada border so we can ship from either country. We charge actual shipping cost and there are absolutely no customs fees for US and Canada orders! A pre-paid deposit is required for local pick-ups. Deposit is credited to your bill when you pick up your games. We will provide detailed payment instructions for you once the order is placed. CONTACT US: Although we will make an effort to respond to all questions via geekmail as quickly as possible, your response time will be faster if you send questions via email to kkboardgames+bgg@gmail.com

And when characters can make that kind of decision, things get very funny _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; very deadly - very quickly. With 25 encounters, all requiring a different group strategy and seperate individual strategy, game play is always challenging. Only 9 random encounters are used in any game, so the experience is always different. With fresh new mechanics built into each expansion and a creature pool now 75 strong - there is always a new adventure ahead. And they become deadlier as we go.
